last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 5
last_episode_to_air.overview: David ends his journey by driving a stunt car, sampling Hollywood luxury in an executive jet, cruising in a 1950s hot rod and taking an aerial tour.

name: David Jason: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
original_name: David Jason: Planes, Trains and Automobiles
overview: In this five-part series, comedy legend Sir David Jason hits the West Coast of the USA. Heâ€™s on a revealing and entertaining journey of a lifetime by planes, trains and automobiles, discovering the machines that made America and changed the world.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: David Jason samples the luxury of 1930s aviation, drives the car that changed the world and climbs aboard a vintage steam train.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: The actor flies into the heart of a volcano, hits the road with an American trucker and takes to the skies in a vintage WWII plane.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: David Jason takes a vintage bus trip, rides a San Francisco cable car, meets a legendary motorcycle club and takes to the air in an old military helicopter.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The actor continues his American journey in dramatic fashion, riding a Wild West stagecoach and vintage locomotive, goes dune buggy do-lally and launches a rocket.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: David ends his journey by driving a stunt car, sampling Hollywood luxury in an executive jet, cruising in a 1950s hot rod and taking an aerial tour.
